title: omya
author: omya
content: Currently, WazirX is not allowing Bitcoin withdrawals, and I am worried about using Bitbns. Please list down any Indian exchanges that are currently allowing Bitcoin or even crypto withdrawals as of today.

comments.author: IIrik11
comments.body: Quote from: omya on June 11, 2023, 07:12:56 AMCurrently, WazirX is not allowing Bitcoin withdrawals, and I am worried about using Bitbns. Please list down any Indian exchanges that are currently allowing Bitcoin or even crypto withdrawals as of today. did they tell u why they're not allowing withdrawals?did u give them everything like your documents..photograph and photograph holding your ids.. ?if yes, contact support and tell them u can even send ur kidney if they want.i don't use cex but cex supporters will be with u shortly.
